message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase [product name] for $1,100,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you, and this price reflects its significant value.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some more money. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal.  While your offer is appreciated, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $1,050,000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're firm on the price, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $980,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering our previous offers.
